title: Publish a Self-Serve Workspace to the Web

questions.question: Web connections let you share authentication information (logins, passwords, API keys, etc.) with other users of FME Server without exposing your plaintext password.
Which of the following is not a valid way to access your workspace in FME Server after publishing it?
options: From FME Workbench, click Run > Run on FME Server.
Login to FME Server and click the link to the Run workspace page on the left sidebar.
Click the Direct Link URL in the Translation Log after publishing the workspace from FME Workbench.

questions.question: The Run Workspace page lets users set Published Parameters that control how the workspace will run.
